answers.answer: What does it hurt to ask? The worst they can say us no. I am almost 35 weeks with my 3rd baby and I have already been planting the seed if induction. I was induced with my 1st 2. I will be 36 when I deliver. I am overweight as well and have chronic high blood pressure. I am due December 30 but would like to have my lo before Christmas. Hopefully things work out for you and for me as well. Good luck.
Thank you let me no how you get on x

I also have high blood pressure and is overweight I am 36 weeks and go to the doctor 2 times a week my plan is to ask to be induced soon my 1st pregnancy was vaginal and 2nd was a C-section so I have an option I think I will go at 38 weeks.

question: Hi im 43 with 3 boys 20,18,5 I was induced with all of them as I was 2wks over my due date with my 5yr old I had signs of preclampsia and had to be rushed in my question is as im over weight too..can I ask to be induced at 40wks or will they still make me go over my due date im worriedThank you x
title: preeclampsia
